title: ‘My Helmet Saved Me Today’: Stage Neutralized After Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Critérium du Dauphiné
content:
Dozens of riders crash on wet roads and officials cancel the stage. Kruijswijk, Van Baarle transported to local hospital.

Read the full article at ‘My Helmet Saved Me Today’: Stage Neutralized After Evenepoel, Roglič Involved in Massive Crash at Critérium du Dauphiné on Velo.
author: ahood
